subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Ryan Lochte set his second American record in three days, winning the 200-yard backstroke last night for his fourth victory at the USA Swimming Short Course Nationals in Atlanta.Natalie Coughlin won three of four races in the three-day meet, adding the 100 freestyle title yesterday in a time that lowered her American record. Michael Phelps won the 100 freestyle for his second individual victory.
